title: Yaar Indha Dhevadhai Lyrics Unnai Ninaithu
stanzas:
Yaar Indha Dhevadhai Lyrics From Unnai Ninaithu

yaar indha dhevadhai
yaar indha dhevadhai

yaar indha dhevadhai
yaar indha dhevadhai
oru kodi pookkal
indha pen pola
azhagaana poo
ondru ulladhaa..

yaar indha dhevadhai
yaar indha dhevadhai

pani kooda unmel
padum velayil
kulir thaangidaamal
dhegam nadungume

malar kooda unnai
thodum velayil
poo endru thaane
sooda ninaikkume

amudham undu vazhndhaal
aayul mudivadhillai
un azhagai paarthu
vazhndhaal amudham
thevayillai..

unnai thaedum podhu
idhayam indru
sugamaaga tholaindhadhe.

yaar indha dhevadhai
yaar indha dhevadhai

anbae un kangal
sudar engiren
adhanaal angae
moolgi pogiren

anbae un peyare
padagu engiren
adhai sollithaane
karayai sergiren

un kolusin osai
kaetka thanga
manigal korpen

adhil irandu 
koraindhu ponaal
kannin manigal
serppen 

unnai theevu pola
kaathu nirkka
kadalaaga maaruven.

yaar indha dhevadhai
yaar indha dhevadhai
